00039 #ifndef LIBCURIE_SEXPR_H
00040 #define LIBCURIE_SEXPR_H
00041 
00042 #include <curie/io.h>
00043 
00044 enum sx_type {
00045     sxt_nil = 0,
00046     sxt_false = 1,
00047     sxt_true = 2,
00048     sxt_integer = 3,
00049     sxt_string = 4,
00050     sxt_symbol = 5,
00051     sxt_cons = 6,
00052     sxt_empty_list = 7,
00053     sxt_end_of_list = 8,
00054     sxt_end_of_file = 9,
00055     sxt_not_a_number = 10,
00056     sxt_nonexistent = 11,
00057     sxt_dot = 12
00058 };
00059 
00060 struct sexpr {
00061     enum sx_type type;
00062     signed int references;
00063 };
00064 
00065 struct sexpr_integer {
00066     enum sx_type type;
00067     signed int references;
00068 
00069     signed long integer;
00070 };
00071 
00072 struct sexpr_cons {
00073     enum sx_type type;
00074     signed int references;
00075 
00076     /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *car;
00077     /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *cdr;
00078 };
00079 
00080 struct sexpr_string_or_symbol {
00081     enum sx_type type;
00082     signed int references;
00083 
00084     char character_data[];
00085 };
00086 
00087 struct sexpr_io {
00088   struct io *in, *out;
00089 };
00090 
00091 /*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct sexpr_io *sx_open_io(/*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct io *, /*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct io *);
00092 
00093 #define sx_open_io_fd(in,out) sx_open_io (io_open ((in)), io_open((out)))
00094 #define sx_open_stdio() sx_open_io_fd(0, 1)
00095 
00096 void sx_close_io (/*@notnull@*/ /*@only@*/ struct sexpr_io *);
00097 
00098 /*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *sx_read(/*@notnull@*/ struct sexpr_io *);
00099 void sx_write(/*@notnull@*/ struct sexpr_io *, /*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *);
00100 
00101 /*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *cons(/*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *, /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *);
00102 /*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *make_integer(signed long);
00103 /*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *make_string(/*@notnull@*/ const char *);
00104 /*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *make_symbol(/*@notnull@*/ const char *);
00105 
00106 void sx_destroy(/*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *);
00107 void sx_xref(/*@notnull@*/ /*@shared@*/ struct sexpr *);
00108 
00109 void *sx_list_map (struct sexpr *, void (*)(struct sexpr *, void *), void *);
00110 struct sexpr *sx_list_fold (struct sexpr *, void (*)(struct sexpr *));
00111 
00112 struct sexpr *equalp (struct sexpr *, struct sexpr *);
00113 
00114 extern struct sexpr * const sx_nil;
00115 extern struct sexpr * const sx_false;
00116 extern struct sexpr * const sx_true;
00117 extern struct sexpr * const sx_empty_list;
00118 extern struct sexpr * const sx_end_of_list;
00119 extern struct sexpr * const sx_end_of_file;
00120 extern struct sexpr * const sx_not_a_number;
00121 extern struct sexpr * const sx_nonexistent;
00122 extern struct sexpr * const sx_dot;
00123 
00124 #define nilp(sx)   (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_nil)          || ((sx)->type == sxt_nil))
00125 #define truep(sx)  (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_true)         || ((sx)->type == sxt_true))
00126 #define falsep(sx) (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_false)        || ((sx)->type == sxt_false))
00127 #define emptyp(sx) (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_empty_list)   || ((sx)->type == sxt_empty_list))
00128 #define eolp(sx)   (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_end_of_list)  || ((sx)->type == sxt_end_of_list))
00129 #define eofp(sx)   (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_end_of_file)  || ((sx)->type == sxt_end_of_file))
00130 #define nanp(sx)   (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_not_a_number) || ((sx)->type == sxt_not_a_number))
00131 #define nexp(sx)   (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_nonexistent)  || ((sx)->type == sxt_nonexistent))
00132 #define dotp(sx)   (((struct sexpr *)(sx) == sx_dot)          || ((sx)->type == sxt_dot))
00133 
00134 #define consp(sx)    ((sx)->type == sxt_cons)
00135 #define stringp(sx)  ((sx)->type == sxt_string)
00136 #define symbolp(sx)  ((sx)->type == sxt_symbol)
00137 #define integerp(sx) ((sx)->type == sxt_integer)
00138 
00139 #define car(sx)        (((sx)->type == sxt_cons) ? (((struct sexpr_cons *)(sx))->car) : sx_nonexistent)
00140 #define cdr(sx)        (((sx)->type == sxt_cons) ? (((struct sexpr_cons *)(sx))->cdr) : sx_nonexistent)
00141 
00142 #define sx_integer(sx) (((sx)->type == sxt_integer) ? (((struct sexpr_integer *)(sx))->integer) : -1)
00143 #define sx_string(sx)  (const char *)(((sx)->type == sxt_string) ? (((struct sexpr_string_or_symbol *)(sx))->character_data) : "#nonexistent")
00144 #define sx_symbol(sx)  (const char *)(((sx)->type == sxt_symbol) ? (((struct sexpr_string_or_symbol *)(sx))->character_data) : "#nonexistent")
00145 
00146 #endif
